name: Bird Game (itch) (dandonnan)
description:
Bird Game is a game where you play as a bird that loves to steal food from the unsuspecting people in the town below. It also loves to poop on them.

Stealing food and pooping on things scores points. But then the people unleash drones to take out the bird. Avoid the drones and keep swooping and pooping to see how high you can get the score.

Disclaimer

Bird Game was developed in just under 30 hours. There's some bits that feel unfinished, and there are bugs.
